description: This file is a shell script designed for diagnostic logging and environment setup in a router or network device. It sources configuration and utility scripts, retrieves device status information, and sends notifications based on device model and port mapping status.

methods.name: echo_t
methods.description: Logs a message with timestamp or to a specific log destination.

methods.name: t2ValNotify
methods.description: Sends a value notification for monitoring or diagnostic purposes.
